    Methods in commandLineApp with parameters of type Farm 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.Boolean GeneralStoreManager.hasEnoughMoney​(Farm farm)
    This method checks if the user has enough money to purchase FarmObjects.
    void GeneralStoreManager.purchaseObject​(Farm farm)
    This method purchases the desired FarmObjects, provided the user can afford to.
    void GeneralStoreManager.purchaseObjectConfirmation​(Farm farm)
    This method informs the user that their purchase was successful.
    void GameManager.setFarm​(Farm farm)  
    void GeneralStoreManager.updateFarmMoney​(Farm farm)
    This method updates the farm balance after the purchase.
    void Inventory.useAnimalFeed​(int animalNum, int animalItemIndex, Farm farm)
    This method uses an AnimalFeed on the chosen Animal.
    void Inventory.useAnimalTreat​(int animalNum, int animalItemIndex, Farm farm)
    This method uses an AnimalTreat on the chosen Animal.

    This method uses GrowthFertiliser on the chosen Crop.

    This method uses ProfitFertiliser on the chosen Crop.

    This method uses a Shovel on the chosen Crop.

    This method uses a Tractor on the chosen LandPlot.
